definition: production of a certain amount, end resistance, as under pressure or force
details:
noun
- production of a certain amount
= synonyms: output
- an amount of a product
= synonyms: fruit
- the income or profit arising from such transactions as the sale of land or other property
= synonyms: return
- the quantity of something (as a commodity) that is created (usually within a given period of time)
= synonyms: production
verb
- end resistance, as under pressure or force
= example: end resistance, as under pressure or force
= synonyms: give way
- consent reluctantly
= synonyms: give in, succumb, knuckle under, buckle under
- be willing to concede
= synonyms: grant
- cease opposition
- be flexible under stress of physical force
= synonyms: give
- give or supply
= synonyms: return
- cause to happen or be responsible for
= synonyms: give
- move in order to make room for someone for something
= synonyms: give, ease up, give way, move over
- bring in
= synonyms: bear, pay
- give over
= synonyms: grant
- be the cause or source of
= synonyms: give, afford
- be fatally overwhelmed
= synonyms: succumb
- give in, as to influence or pressure
= synonyms: soften, relent
